alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 8:16PM CDT until August 24 at 7:51AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. For the Trinity River...including Dallas, Rosser, Trinidad, Long Lake (Oakwood)...Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River At Dallas. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Major flooding will occur in Dallas along the river between the levee banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 37.5 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 39.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
